name: Highway Racing In Car Games +
description:
Highway Racing in car is the newest racing game in traffic, where you have to dodge cars and earn points!
Choose one of the many available cars and get behind the wheel, drive up to the highway and start racing!
In this game, speed is your best friend! Try to reach the maximum speed in traffic while also avoiding other automobiles on the highway.
Modern cars with incredible and realistic details. Choose the car you like and drive it on the roads!
Collect points by overtaking cars and try not to crash!
Listen to popular music while driving, feel the vibe! Explore the beautiful never ending map of Highway Racing in car.
Amazing graphics for your mobile device, Great performance and carefully crafted sound design.
Game Features:
• Choose your car to drive on the highway
• Reach the maximum speed on the highway and set a new high score!
• Overtake other cars on the highway to earn points
• Beautiful graphics and immersive gameplay
Download it for free right now!
